Package gobblin.config.store.deploy

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Deployable<D extends DeploymentConfig>
    An interface to deploy and rollback ConfigStores.
    DeployableConfigSource
    An abstraction for accessing configs to be deployed by the ConfigStore.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClasspathConfigSource
    A DeployableConfigSource that reads configs to be deployed from classpath.
    ConfigStream
    A wrapper for InputStream that also contains the path of the resource.
    DeploymentConfig
    Holds deployment configuration to be passed to Deployable.deploy(DeploymentConfig)
    FsDeploymentConfig
    A DeploymentConfig for Hadoop FileSystem based stores.
    StoreDeployer
    A tool to deploy configs provided by a DeployableConfigSource to a ConfigStore.
